snippet: In advance of a concert series honoring the jazz pianist Cecil Taylor, he and other participating musicians discussed his improvisational work.
abstract: Ben Ratliff Critic's Notebook on concert series Cecil Taylor: A Celebration of the Maestro, presented by Issue Project Room and Harlem Stage as a tribute to the improvisational pianist Cecil Taylor.
lead_paragraph: In advance of a concert series honoring the jazz pianist Cecil Taylor, he and other participating musicians discussed his improvisational work.

headline.main: Lessons From the Dean of the School of Improv
headline.print_headline: Lessons From the Dean Of the School of Improv
